ModMetaData.name: ED-TurretControl
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 02.00.00
Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995 Please Use that Thread for Discussion / Feedback that would like me to reply to. Ideally Bugs should be logged on GitHub although in the discussion thread is also fine.
This mod used the Harmony Library. The .dll of the Library is included in the download, you do not need to install it separately. https://github.com/pardeike/Harmony https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=29517.0
Allows Commands for Force Attack to be given to Turrets.
